tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE social_media_activity (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date TIMESTAMP,
    author_name VARCHAR(50),
    likes_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE PostInteractions (
    interaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES SocialMediaPosts(post_id)
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_activity (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    activity_date TIMESTAMP,
    likes INT,
    shares INT
);

CREATE TABLE social_science_study (
    study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    study_name VARCHAR(255),
    researcher VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    social_media_platform VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_posts (
    post_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES social_media_users(user_id),
    post_content TEXT NOT NULL,
    post_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    likes_count INT DEFAULT 0
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_comments (
    comment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id UUID REFERENCES social_media_posts(post_id),
    user_id UUID REFERENCES social_media_users(user_id),
    comment_content TEXT NOT NULL,
    comment_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_engagement (
    engagement_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id UUID REFERENCES social_media_posts(post_id),
    user_id UUID REFERENCES social_media_users(user_id),
    reaction_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    engagement_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE SocialMediaUsers (
 user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 username VARCHAR(50),
 followers_count INT,
 following_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE Posts (
 post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 user_id INT,
 post_text TEXT,
 post_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Comments (
 comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 post_id INT,
 user_id INT,
 comment_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Likes (
 like_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 post_id INT,
 user_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE Trends (
 trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 trend_name VARCHAR(50),
 trend_description TEXT,
 trend_activity_count INT
)
